name: Hyper Ultra Astronautics
description:
Hone your pilot skills in solo or co-op survival matches and challenge your friends to a competitive match. Outmaneuver your opponents, take cover behind asteroids, collect bigger guns and take down your enemies!

Hyper Ultra Astronautics is an intense physics-based local multiplayer space shoot'em up with co-op and competitive game modes for 1-16 players. Run the game on almost any PC. Play using keyboard, mouse, gamepads or your mobile device as a controller.

System requirements: Windows or Linux PC with Intel HD4000 or better GPU. Mobile controller application requires Android 4.0 or later and Wi-Fi access to same network with the PC.

The mobile controller application is available on Google Play.

Feel free to leave feedback or bug reports on the discussion board here or contact me via email or web form. All feedback will be greatly appreciated!
